Text: Maybe I'm doing something wrong but all I see are questions.  No answers at all.  How about you guys?  I'm using Stanza with the .epub

The ePUB is good. Am using FBReader.

Quoting from the book ...

First question in Chemistry:

Q: What is a nitrate ?
A: It is much cheaper than a day rate.


further into the chapter ...

Q: Describe the chemical differences between H2O and CO2.
A: H2O is hot water, CO2 is cold water.

:)
Figured it out.  Neither Stanza nor Nook Simple Touch have the fonts to handle the handwritten answers.  Converted .epub to .PDF and am good to go.
